title: Mondo Cane - Grateful Dead Soundtrack Edition
description:
MONDO CANE - Grateful Dead Soundtrack Edition.
Originally from the Mondo Cane Collection box set from Blue Underground.

108 minutes (including trailer for Mondo Pazzo, the "sequel")

MPEG-4 AVC h264 ripped at approx 1400 from DVD-R
Video resolution: 704x480
29.97 frames per second

English subtitles with the Dead replacing completely the original soundtrack.

Includes original American theatrical trailer

Pioneering "documentary" of realistic scenes, staged or authentic, that shocked audiences in 1962. Today we can admire the unexpected twists and turns & organizational principles of the film, some excellent photography, and this spanking new soundtrack of old Grateful Dead recordings. It becomes quite psychedelic, but gradually, so settle back and relax for this.  

Soundtrack compiled from four 21st century remastered Grateful Dead CD releases, all recorded live between 1971 and 1972:

01 Cumberland Blues
02 Oh Boy!
03 I'm a Hog for You, Baby
04 You Win Again
05 Uncle John's Band
06 Turn On Your Lovelight
07 Dark Star
08 Me & My Uncle
09 Dark Star
10 Wharf Rat
11 Sugar Magnolia

1 and 4 from Europe '72
2 and 3 are bonus tracks from The Grateful Dead (1971)
5 and 6 from Ladies and Gentlemen . . . (Fillmore East 1971)
7 through 11 from Rockin' the Rhein (Dusseldorf, West Germany 24/4/72)
